Vector4i
========

ä½¿ç”¨æ•´æ•°åæ ‡çš„ 4D å‘é‡ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-introduction-group

æè¿°
----

åŒ…å«å››ä¸ªå…ƒç´ çš„ç»“æ„ä½“ï¼Œå¯ç”¨äºä»£è¡¨ 4D åæ ‡æˆ–ä»»ä½•æ•´æ•°çš„å››å…ƒç»„ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-method

è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°å‘é‡ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªåˆ†é‡éƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`@GlobalScope.clamp<class_@GlobalScope_method_clamp>` é™åˆ¶åœ¨ ``min`` å’Œ ``max`` ä¹‹é—´ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Vector4i_method_clampi:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Vector4i<class_Vector4i>` **clampi**\ (\ min\: :ref:`int<class_int>`, max\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Vector4i_method_clampi>`

Returns a new vector with all components clamped between ``min`` and ``max``, by running :ref:`@GlobalScope.clamp<class_@GlobalScope_method_clamp>` on each component.

.. _class_Vector4i_method_maxi:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Vector4i<class_Vector4i>` **maxi**\ (\ with\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Vector4i_method_maxi>`

è¿”å›è‡ªèº«ä¸ ``with`` å„åˆ†é‡çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼ï¼Œç­‰ä»·äº ``Vector4i(maxi(x, with), maxi(y, with), maxi(z, with), maxi(w, with))``\ ã€‚

è¿”å›è‡ªèº«ä¸ ``with`` å„åˆ†é‡çš„æœ€å°å€¼ï¼Œç­‰ä»·äº ``Vector4i(mini(x, with.x), mini(y, with.y), mini(z, with.z), mini(w, with.w))``\ ã€‚

.. _class_Vector4i_method_snapped:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Vector4i<class_Vector4i>` **snapped**\ (\ step\: :ref:`Vector4i<class_Vector4i>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Vector4i_method_snapped>`

è¿”å›æ–°çš„å‘é‡ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªåˆ†é‡éƒ½å¸é™„åˆ°äº†ä¸ ``step`` ä¸­å¯¹åº”åˆ†é‡æœ€æ¥è¿‘çš„å€æ•°ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Vector4i_method_snappedi:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Vector4i<class_Vector4i>` **snappedi**\ (\ step\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Vector4i_method_snappedi>`

Returns a new vector with each component snapped to the closest multiple of ``step``.

:ref:`Vector4i<class_Vector4i>` **operator %**\ (\ right\: :ref:`Vector4i<class_Vector4i>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Vector4i_operator_mod_Vector4i>`

è·å–è¯¥ **Vector4i** çš„æ¯ä¸ªåˆ†é‡ä¸ç»™å®š **Vector4i** ä¸­åˆ†é‡çš„ä½™æ•°ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªè¿ç®—ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯æˆªæ–­å¼é™¤æ³•ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå¯¹è´Ÿæ•°ä¸å‹å¥½ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥é€šå¸¸ä¸ä¼šæƒ³è¦ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚å¦‚æœä½ æƒ³è¦å¤„ç†è´Ÿæ•°ï¼Œè¯·è€ƒè™‘æ”¹ç”¨ :ref:`@GlobalScope.posmod<class_@GlobalScope_method_posmod>`\ ã€‚

::

    print(Vector4i(10, -20, 30, -40) % Vector4i(7, 8, 9, 10))  # è¾“å‡º "(3, -4, 3, 0)"

è·å–è¯¥ **Vector4i** çš„æ¯ä¸ªåˆ†é‡ä¸ç»™å®šçš„ :ref:`int<class_int>` çš„ä½™æ•°ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªè¿ç®—ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯æˆªæ–­å¼é™¤æ³•ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå¯¹è´Ÿæ•°ä¸å‹å¥½ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥é€šå¸¸ä¸ä¼šæƒ³è¦ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚å¦‚æœä½ æƒ³è¦å¤„ç†è´Ÿæ•°ï¼Œè¯·è€ƒè™‘æ”¹ç”¨ :ref:`@GlobalScope.posmod<class_@GlobalScope_method_posmod>`\ ã€‚
